column5: Well it was bassin' in the morning, and carping in the afternoon!  Things were a bit slower at the carp hole but I think I got one of the biggest carp I've ever caught out of the Lynn River on BBR's magic cherry dough. Was a great night. Now for pics!  Fight shots:       Fish:    And the beast!
nice looking bottom feeder ya got there rich.. Drop me a line on msn sometime..i want to link up and go fishing again!
Don't you have diapers to change?  Belated congrats!
Great pics! Man... You seem to get out a lot!!! I need to know your secret!
Great report Rich...the carp in my usual spots have disappeared...and the last few times I've targeted them I've had nothing to show for it.  Great job!
We change them in the great outdoors! Ethan was right behind me while I landed my carp (in his stroller with mommy watching of course). haha    Thanks man
Great report Rich!  Belated congrats on the little one...I see a carping phenom in the making
